definition: سم samma u (samm) to put poison (هـ into s.th.); to poison (ه s.o., هـ s.th.) II to poison (هـ s.th.) V to be poisoned, poison o.s. سم samm pl. سموم sumūm, سمام simām poison, toxin; venom; opening, hole; eye (of a needle) │ السموم البيضاء (baiḍā’) the white narcotics (such as cocaine, Heroin, etc.)
